Merge/upsert data into a DuckLake table

Source: R/ducklake.R
ducklake_merge.Rd

Merge/upsert data into a DuckLake table

Usage

ducklake_merge(
  con,
  target,
  source,
  on_cols,
  when_matched = "UPDATE",
  when_not_matched = "INSERT",
  update_cols = NULL
)

Arguments

con

DuckDB connection with DuckLake attached.

target

Target table name.

source

Source table/query.

on_cols

Column(s) to match on.

when_matched

Action when matched: "UPDATE", "DELETE", or NULL.

when_not_matched

Action when not matched: "INSERT" or NULL.

update_cols

Columns to update (NULL = all columns).

Value

Number of rows affected.

On this page
